about_the_game:
Master Lemon is a heartwarming pixel art adventure that invites players to embark on a journey of language and memory. Inspired by true events, you play as Lemon, a polyglot with a dream of learning Icelandic, tasked with saving a distant land from a threat that devours memories and endangers the world's linguistic heritage.



The game is a tribute to André Lima, a vibrant adventurer whose passion for languages and cultures knew no bounds. Set against the enchanting backdrop of Iceland, where he lived his dream, Master Lemon celebrates his legacy and the enduring bond of friendship that transcends time and loss.

The Power of Words
Explore a beautifully crafted world filled with puzzles designed to enhance your linguistic skills in multiple languages. Learn and relearn words to overcome challenges.

Simple and Intuitive Mechanics
Engage with an easy-to-navigate interface reminiscent of classic handheld adventures, allowing you to focus on exploration and learning.

Puzzle-packed Adventure
Navigate through various levels that test your wit and cunning, offering a rewarding experience as you unravel the mystery of the Dimentics.

Celebrate Friendship and Memories
Immerse yourself in a story that honors the unbreakable bond of friendship and the love of adventure, inspired by real-life connections.

Make a Lemonade out of Lemons
Embrace the spirit of resilience and curiosity as you journey with Lemon. This adventure is not just about overcoming obstacles, but about celebrating life, language, and friendship.

Join us in saving the language's legacy. Let’s embark on this quest together in Master Lemon.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU, Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.0 support
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: MASTER LEMON is a narrative adventure game inspired by a true story. Players solve puzzles and face tough choices as Lemon tries to save a land from a memory-eating plague that threatens world languages.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Ukrainian, Arabic
*languages with full audio support
